item.title: HomeBridge setup
item.description: HomeBridge setup and supported accessories. Homebridge instalation. Simple way to install it, is using docker and docker compose. 1version: '2' 2services: 3 homebridge: 4 image: oznu/homebridge:ubuntu 5 restart: always 6 network_mode: host 7 environment: 8 - PGID=1000 9 - PUID=1000 10 - HOMEBRIDGE_CONFIG_UI=1 11 - HOMEBRIDGE_CONFIG_UI_PORT=8581 12 - TZ=Canberra/Australia 13 volumes: 14 - ./volumes/homebridge:/homebridge For more ways to install and for configuration options head to the official docs of HomeBridge here.
